recipesJson.name: Lemon Drop Cookie
recipesJson.author: RRbum
recipesJson.description: A surprisingly realistic vape. Nice lemon cookie flavor with sugar on the exhale and remaining ever so lightly on the palate. Good as snv, improves with age.

reviews.text: Different than what you'd expect from a lemon cookie recipe, but that's a good thing here.  The more authentic lemon flavor and brown sugar cookie type are welcome deviations from the norm
